alert.note: Alert for Republic; Washington (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 12 at 7:45PM CDT until April 13 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN REPUBLIC...WASHINGTON AND NORTHEASTERN CLOUD COUNTIES... At 745 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 4 miles west of Hollenberg to near Clifton, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters reported quarter size hail east of Cuba. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Washington, Clyde, Hanover, Linn, Greenleaf, Morrowville, Palmer, Haddam, Agenda and Hollenberg. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
